```{r cars, echo = F, message=F, warning=F}
library(highcharter)

cities_data <- data.frame(
  name = c("Istanbul", "Ankara", "Izmir"),
  lat = c(41.0082, 39.9334, 38.4192),
  lon = c(28.9784, 32.8597, 27.1287),
  spending = c(1200000, 800000, 600000), # Arbitrary spending amounts
  z = c(1,2,3),
  url = c("https://favstats.github.io/locturkex2024/", "https://favstats.github.io/locturkex2024/docs", "https://favstats.github.io/locturkex2024/docs/location")
)

# function() {
#   updateParentIframe(this.options.url); // Assuming this.options.url contains the URL to set in the parent iframe
# }

hcmap("countries/tr/tr-all", showInLegend = FALSE) %>%
  hc_add_series(
    data = cities_data, 
    type = "mapbubble",
    name = "Cities", 
    minSize = "1%",
    maxSize = "5%"
  ) %>%
  hc_mapNavigation(enabled = TRUE) %>%
  hc_title(text = "Spending by City in Turkey") %>%
  hc_plotOptions(series = list(
  cursor = "pointer",
  point = list(
      events = list(
        click = JS("function() { 
          var iframe = window.parent.document.getElementById('iframeDisplay');
          if(iframe) {
            iframe.src = this.options.url; 
          } else {
            console.error('Iframe not found');
          }
        }")
      )
  )
))



```
